bibl.title: Two Customs-House Receipts from the Bodleian Library.
bibl.note: I. P. Bodl. Ms.Gr.class. g. 20 (P). Soknopaiou Nesos, 29 April 210. - II. P. Bodl. Ms.Gr.class. g. 14 (P). Soknopaiou Nesos, 4 July 211. - Pp. 217-218: Appendix [a small dossier of thirteen customs-receipts from Soknopaiou Nesos].
ADAMS Colin E.P. and Nikolaos GONIS, Two Customs-House Receipts from the Bodleian Library.
ZPE 126 (1999) pp. 213-218, 1 tabl. et pl. III.
